entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High 15. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016
